headline: Ask HN: What are some creative ways to save on income taxes as w2?
description:
Obviously max out 401k, have kids, move to state with no income tax, buy a house, etc.

But what else.

Only thing I can think of is start legit business with lot of upfront costs, but not being a CPA, who knows?

I remember leak a year ago where it was revealed how lots of rich people were paying almost no taxes, pro-publica?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 有哪些创造性的方法可以作为w2节省所得税？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 有哪些創造性的方法可以作為w2節省所得稅？
description_zh-Hans:
但还有什么呢？

我唯一能想到的是开始合法的生意，有很多前期费用，但不是注册会计师，谁知道呢？

我记得一年前的泄漏，它揭示了许多富人是如何几乎不交税的，pro-publica？
description_zh-Hant:
但還有什麼呢？

我唯一能想到的是開始合法的生意，有很多前期費用，但不是註冊會計師，誰知道呢？

我記得一年前的洩漏，它揭示了許多富人是如何幾乎不交稅的，pro-publica？
